getPSAppCounter.name: 工作项关联分页计数器

editorParams.USERINSCRIPT: value.replaceAll(/\@\{\"(user)?id\":\"(.+?)\",\"name\":\"(.+?)\"\}/g,(x, user, id, name) => {return controller.getNodeInfo({ id, name })}).replaceAll(/\@\{userid=(.+?),name=(.+?)\}/g,(x, id, name) => {return controller.getNodeInfo({ id, name })})
editorParams.QUOTEINSCRIPT: value.replaceAll(/\#\{(\".+?\":\".+?\"),\"icon\":\"((.|[\t\r\f\n\s])+?)\"\}/g,(x, value, icon) => { const item = JSON.parse("{" + value + "}"); return controller.getNodeInfo({ icon, ...item })})

getPSPanelItemGroupLogics.name: 面板成员[container2][面板显示]逻辑

editorParams.SCRIPTCODE: data.content?.replace(/@{[^,]*,"name":"(.*?)"}/g,"@$1").replace(/@{[^,]*,name=(.*?)}/g,"@$1").replaceAll(/\#\{(\".+?\":\".+?\"),\"icon\":\"((.|[\t\r\f\n\s])+?)\"\}/g, (x, value, icon) => {const item = JSON.parse("{" + value + "}"); const tempIcon = icon.trim(); return `${tempIcon} ${item.identifier} ${item.name}`;}).replaceAll(/\{\"\emoji\":\"(.+?)\"\}/g,(x, emoji) => {const tempVal = decodeURIComponent(atob(emoji)); return `${tempVal}`})

getPSPanelItemGroupLogics.name: 面板成员[container3][面板显示]逻辑

getPSControlRenders.layoutPanelModel: data.pcontent?.replace(/@{[^,]*,"name":"(.*?)"}/g,"@$1").replace(/@{[^,]*,name=(.*?)}/g,"@$1").replaceAll(/#{(".+?":".+?"),"icon":"((.|[\t\r\f\n\s])+?)"}/g, (x, value, icon) => {const item = JSON.parse("{" + value + "}"); const tempIcon = icon.trim(); return `${tempIcon} ${item.identifier} ${item.name}`;}).replaceAll(/(.+?)<\/span>/g,(x, emoji) => {const tempVal = decodeURIComponent(atob(emoji));return `${tempVal}`;}).replaceAll(/{"emoji":"(.+?)"}/g, (x, emoji) => {const tempVal = decodeURIComponent(atob(emoji));return `${tempVal}`;})
getPSControlRenders.name: logic1

editorParams.template:
{{#each this as | item |}}
修改了{{#if item.logicname}}{{item.logicname}}{{else}}{{item.dataauditdetailname}}{{/if}} {{#or (eq item.dataauditdetailname 'STEPS') (eq item.dataauditdetailname 'PRECONDITION') (eq item.dataauditdetailname 'DESCRIPTION')}}对比{{/or}}
{{#and (neq item.dataauditdetailname 'STEPS') (neq item.dataauditdetailname 'PRECONDITION') (neq item.dataauditdetailname 'DESCRIPTION')}}
{{#if item.oldtext}}{{item.oldtext}}{{else}}{{#if item.oldvalue}}{{item.oldvalue}}{{else}}无{{/if}}{{/if}}{{#if item.newtext}}{{item.newtext}}{{else}}{{#if item.newvalue}}{{item.newvalue}}{{else}}无{{/if}}{{/if}}
{{/and}}
{{/each}}

{{#each this as | item |}}

{{#and (neq item.dataauditdetailname 'STEPS') (neq item.dataauditdetailname 'PRECONDITION') (neq item.dataauditdetailname 'DESCRIPTION')}}
{{#if item.oldtext}}{{item.oldtext}}{{else}}{{#if item.oldvalue}}{{item.oldvalue}}{{else}}无{{/if}}{{/if}}{{#if item.newtext}}{{item.newtext}}{{else}}{{#if item.newvalue}}{{item.newvalue}}{{else}}无{{/if}}{{/if}}
{{/and}}
{{/each}}
